ineligible.ieTitle: Thank you for completing our eligibility survey!
ineligible.ineligibility: At this time, we are unable to provide programming for your student. If you have any questions, please reach out to our Program Manager at

eligible.title: Congratulations!
eligible.schedule: If you register, your student's classes would take place on:
eligible.inPerson: Your student is also eligible for our in-person programming. We're unable to determine when we will go back to in-person programming at this time, but we will provide you with more information when we have it.

waitingList.wlTitle: Thank you for completing our eligibility survey!
waitingList.message: Unfortunately, this division is currently at capacity and cannot accept any additional students. Please complete our waiting list form and we will contact you if a slot opens up.
